title: Meizu M2 Note -  Review Indonesia
description: Dukung terus DroidLime untuk berkarya membawa nama Indonesia. Ingat GADGET, ingat DROIDLIME...!Spesifikasi Meizu M2 Note: Harga: Rp1.999.000CPU: 8-core MediaTek MT6735 1,3 GHz (based on CPU-z dan AIDA64)GPU: Mali-T720MP3RAM: 2 GBStorage: 16 GBOS: Flyme OS 4.5 (Android 5.1)Kamera: 13 MP & 5 MPBaterai: 3.100 mAhLayar: IGZO 5,5 inci (1.920 x 1.080 piksel)Talent: Imelda LianziReview by: DroidLimeWardrobe by: Sophie Paris (http://www.sohieparis.com)Music by: Jim Yosef & Alex Skrindo - Passion(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pxEKoZKpCew)FB: DroidLime https://www.facebook.com/droidlimeTwitter: @droidlime https://twitter.com/droidlimeInstagram: https://instagram.com/droidlimeGPlus: DroidLime https://plus.google.com/+Droidlime
